Gssha File Object Base¶

This class is inherited by all other GsshaPy file classes. It defines properties used by file objects to read and write files. It also defines the read() and write() methods.

class gsshapy.orm.file_base.GsshaPyFileObjectBase(directory, filename, session)[source]¶

classdocs

COMMIT_ERROR_MESSAGE = 'Ensure the file is not empty and try again.'¶
